CustomField.description: Defines if a Leave will be excluded from Bulk Employee Rejection listings. When TRUE the Leave will be excluded from Bulk Employee Rejection. Rejection emails can only be send on the individual basis via the Leaves
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if a Leave will be excluded from Bulk Employee Rejection listings. When TRUE the Leave will be excluded from Bulk Employee Rejection. Rejection emails can only be send on the individual basis via the Leaves
CustomField.label: Exclude From Employee Rejection List
